summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Meridian Avenue from North Seventy-seventh Street to North Eighty-fifth Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 25358, creating Local Improvement District No. 2413 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
